full_summary:
# **Notice of Proposed Procurement**

## **File Number and Title**

* File Number: W8485-TSPS 2023-02
* Title: Intermediate Technical Clerk

## **Procurement Description**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals for the services of an Intermediate Technical Clerk to support the Directorate of Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DAEPM), Tactical Aviation and Simulation (TA&S) 2-4. The successful bidder will provide Aircraft Maintenance Control Record Specialist services for a period of two years, plus three one-year irrevocable options to extend the contract.

## **Security Requirements**

Suppliers must have a current Security Clearance at the FSC - Secret level, with no requirement for document safeguarding.

## **Location of Work**

The successful bidder is required to work in the National Capital Region (NCR), with possible sites at the Transport Canada Aviation Service Department (TCASD) at the Ottawa International Airport, or other DND and Government of Canada buildings.

## **Bid Submission Requirements**

Bidders must submit all required information as detailed in article 2.3 of Part 2 of the bid solicitation, in order to comply with Treasury Board policies and directives on contracts awarded to former public servants.

## **Contact Information**

For inquiries regarding this RFP requirement, please contact Tracey-Lynn Sheppard, DND POC:

* Email: DapServicesBidReceiving-DoaServicesReceptionDesSoumissions@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: 819-939-4193

The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

## **Language of Submission**

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

Note: The rewritten entry is within the 400-word limit and formatted in markdown. The text has been rephrased to be more professional and concise, while maintaining the essential information.  I have omitted any irrelevant details or repetitive information. Please review and let me know if you need further assistance.
